document_data.name: Tareen Kafour
document_data.home: [[Hammer-Felled Tree]], [[Mulmaster]]{{Cite adventurers league/Black Heart of Vengeance|16}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Tareen Kafour''' ({{pronounce|tuh|REEN|_|KAY|fur|refs=}}) was a barkeeper in [[Mulmaster]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History:
Tareen originally lived in [[Phlan]] until [[Vorgansharax]]'s coup forced her to escape to Mulmaster. There she opened a pub, the [[Hammer-Felled Tree]].

Around [[1491 DR]], Tareen's pub was a recruitment center for the army of [[Aleyd Burral]].
document_data.Personality: Tareen completely approved of the [[Liberators]]' cause but knew nothing about the [[Cult of the Black Earth|earth cultists]] inside it.
